title: Judy Woodruff Prepares to Sign Off as a ‘PBS NewsHour’ Anchor
description: At 75, “the last grown-up in Washington journalism” prepares to sign off after nearly a decade as an anchor of “PBS NewsHour.”
dc:creator: Katherine Rosman

media:content.media:credit: Nate Palmer for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Judy Woodruff at the “PBS NewsHour” anchor desk last month.
